body_html: This seems important. @sguada we should consider the right course of action here before 1.0. In the short term, can one of the interested parties send me a PR documenting the fact that decay might have to be significantly lowered when experiencing poor eval performance? I am pretty sure I've never had to tweak that parameter, but it might be a side effect of the distributed setting.

body: This seems important. @sguada we should consider the right course of action here before 1.0. In the short term, can one of the interested parties send me a PR documenting the fact that `decay` might have to be significantly lowered when experiencing poor eval performance? I am pretty sure I've never had to tweak that parameter, but it might be a side effect of the distributed setting.
